head.title: National Briefing | South: North Carolina: Grahams Say They Will Be Buried At New Library

hedline.hl1: National Briefing | South: North Carolina: Grahams Say They Will Be Buried At New Library
hedline.hl2: North Carolina: Grahams Say They Will Be Buried at New Library

abstract.p: Rev Billy Graham announces that he and his wife, Ruth Bell Graham, have decided to be buried at new Billy Graham Library in Charlotte (S)

block.p: The Rev. Billy Graham announced that he and his wife, Ruth Bell Graham, have decided to be buried at the new Billy Graham Library in Charlotte. Mrs. Graham, who has been bedridden for several years, has reportedly slipped into a coma. Disagreements between the Grahams' children over the couple's burial site became public last year. Mrs. Graham, 86, preferred a long-planned site at the Cove, a retreat center in Asheville that she helped design for the Billy Graham Evangelistic Association. Asheville is nearer to the couple's mountain homestead in Montreat.
